english.segment1: I will not pretend to feel the pain youre going through. I know I cannot comprehend the hurt youve known. And I used to think it mattered if I understood. But now I just dont know
english.segment2: Well, Ill admit sometimes I still wish I knew what to say. And I keep looking for a way to fix it all. But we know were at the mercy of Gods higher ways. And our ways are so small
english.segment3: But I will carry you to Jesus. He is everything you need. I will carry you to Jesus on my knees
english.segment4: Its such a privilege for me to give this gift to you. All Id ever hope youd give me in return. Is to know that youll be there to do the same for me. When the tables turn
english.segment5: And if you need to cry go on and I, I will cry along with you, yeah. Ive given you what I have but still I know the best thing I can do. Is just pray for you
english.segment6: Ill carry you. Ill take you to Jesus on my knees
